cover.title: Innovation and Technology to Revolutionize Patient Recruitment in Latin America
cover.subtitle: Our solutions combine data analysis, specialized communication, and humanized patient management in a modern and secure technological environment. Let's work together!

resources.title: The effectiveness and precision of our comprehensive solutions make us the leading company in the region.

patient.name: Patient Centricity
patient.description: We ensure to consider the needs and address our strategies from their perspective.

innovation.name: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: We accelerate patient recruitment through completely innovative technological solutions.

precision.name: Precision and Efficiency
precision.description: Our technological approach guarantees the effectiveness and quality of our recruitment.

catchment.name: Selective Catchment
catchment.description: Our data management and analysis enable precise and effective patient catchment and selection, reducing the failure rate.

realTime.name: Real-Time Monitoring
realTime.description: We record, monitor, and analyze training and patient management metrics in real time, allowing us to be reactive and strategic.

automatization.name: Automation and Speed
automatization.description: We optimize our processes and implement innovative digital tools to save time and costs.

sites.title: From Latin America to Latin America
sites.subtitle: Understanding the cultural heterogeneity of the region, the characteristics of the healthcare system, and the challenges of patients in each country is key to the effectiveness of our work.

esclerosis.title: Multiple Sclerosis RR
esclerosis.text: We contributed 50% of the target country in just 7 months of active campaign.
esclerosis.label: Guatemala 7 months

crohn.title: Crohn's Disease
crohn.text: We contributed 75% of the target country in just 11 months of active campaign.
crohn.label: Mexico 11 months

esquizofrenia.title: Schizophrenia
esquizofrenia.text: We contributed 68% of the target country in just 5 months of active campaign.
esquizofrenia.label: Latam 5 months

medicalNetwork.title: Network of Referring Physicians
medicalNetwork.description: We have a network of medical specialists in different therapeutic areas interested in offering their patients the opportunity to participate in clinical trials. These professionals, informed in advance about available research protocols, have the possibility to refer potential candidates through our secure electronic platforms and access real-time patient follow-up at every stage of the protocol.

clinicalSearch.text: Discover the first and only online clinical trial search engine with user-friendly language for Latin America.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.thanks: Thank you very much for registering! You will find important information in your inbox.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation for Patient Recruitment
innovation.label: Our Products
innovation.description: We develop cutting-edge technological platforms and tools to capture patients accurately, effectively, and securely:

content.title: A Trial For Me
content.text: 360째 solutions to strategically connect all stakeholders involved in clinical research to effectively accelerate patient recruitment. It offers strategies for digital patient acquisition and management, as well as support for medical researchers and teams involved in each Research Center. Through its online search engine, it facilitates patients' access to clinical trials by providing simple and reliable information.
content.helper: Do you want to know more about our products?

proposal.title: We Develop High-Level Technological Proposals to Face These Challenges

content.text: Our communication strategies take into account not only the patient's clinical profile but also the cultural characteristics specific to each country in the region: language, customs, idioms, and dialects.
content.textBold: We focus on human, ethical, empathetic, diverse, inclusive, and effective communication.
